keyPolicies.policyDescription: Sally Keeble welcomes the increase in funding for Northampton University by the Higher Education Funding Council as part of the Government's program to provide more higher education places.

mentions.candidate: Sally Keeble has held regular surgeries at the University to hear the views and matters of students.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Lib Dems have always come third in Northampton North. A vote for the Lib Dems will let the Tories in.

issues.economy: “This is good news for the University and for the town. We will be relying on the skills of the University students to regenerate the local economy,” said Sally Keeble.
issues.education: The increase announced by the Higher Education Funding Council is 2.6 percent above the projected terms increase. Northampton University is bucking the national trend in getting an increase in Government funding next year.

politicalExperience.achievements: Increase in funding for Northampton University; the university has welcomed this as good news.

endorsements.endorser: Daniel Perkins, University of Northampton student
endorsements.endorsement: Sally's willingness to reach out to the student population shows the kind of politician Sally is. A Member of Parliament who acts on behalf of all constituents.

quotes.text: Sally's willingness to reach out to the student population shows the kind of politician Sally is. A Member of Parliament who acts on behalf of all constituents.
quotes.source: Daniel Perkins, University of Northampton student

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet provides information on the support Sally Keeble has offered to students and the success in obtaining additional funding for Northampton University.
